alchemistFeats.benefits: A combination of additional viscosity and careful application keeps your weapons poisoned even when suffering significant wear and tear.

alchemistFeats.name: Feral Mutagen
alchemistFeats.benefits: Your bestial mutagen brings out the beast lurking within you.

alchemistFeats.name: Perpetual Breadth

alchemistFeats.benefits: You can cause your body to twist and flow like the quicksilver within your mutagens.

alchemistFeats.benefits: You lob bombs unerringly, despite obstructions or distance.

alchemistFeats.name: Glib Mutagen
alchemistFeats.benefits: Your silvertongue mutagen transcends languages and plausibility.

alchemistFeats.name: Greater Merciful Elixir
alchemistFeats.benefits: Your additives contain panaceas that can remedy a plethora of maladies.

alchemistFeats.name: True Debilitating Bomb
alchemistFeats.benefits: Ever inventive, you have discovered increasingly devastating ways for your bombs to impede and hamper your foes.

alchemistFeats.name: Chemical Contagion
alchemistFeats.benefits: With carefully engineered enzymes, you coax some of your poison to infect another target, using the original victim as a carrier.

alchemistFeats.name: Eternal Elixir
alchemistFeats.benefits: Your body readily accepts and retains minor changes.

alchemistFeats.name: Exploitive Bomb
alchemistFeats.benefits: You mix a substance into the bomb to foil resistances.

alchemistFeats.name: Genius Mutagen
alchemistFeats.benefits: Specialized tweaks to your formula that supplements your genius considerably broaden the benefits you gain from cognitive mutagens.

alchemistFeats.name: Persistent Mutagen
alchemistFeats.benefits: You’ve trained your physical form to remain stable within the a given altered state.

alchemistFeats.name: Improbable Elixirs
alchemistFeats.benefits: Your mastery of alchemical secrets enables you to replicate effects most believe can be achieved only via magic.

alchemistFeats.name: Mindblank Mutagen
alchemistFeats.benefits: With a minor adjustment of ratios in the formula for your serene mutagen, you gain mental protections.

alchemistFeats.name: Miracle Worker
alchemistFeats.benefits: Your alchemical mastery can resuscitate the recently slain.

alchemistFeats.name: Perfect Debilitation
alchemistFeats.benefits: You have perfected the formulas for bombs that impede your enemies.

alchemistFeats.name: Astonishing Explosion
alchemistFeats.benefits: Your bomb incorporates an explosive spark of wonder that leaves witnesses dumbfounded.

alchemistFeats.name: Craft Philosopher's Stone
alchemistFeats.benefits: Your research has paid off, culminating in the legendary philosopher’s stone.

alchemistFeats.name: Efficient Alchemy (Paragon)
alchemistFeats.benefits: Prepare more alchemical items from your infused reagents.

alchemistFeats.name: Mega Bomb
alchemistFeats.benefits: You add an incredibly powerful additive to a held bomb to create a mega bomb.

alchemistFeats.name: Perfect Mutagen
alchemistFeats.benefits: You have enhanced the formulas for your mutagens, aligning them perfectly to your physiology.

alchemistFeats.name: Wish Alchemy
alchemistFeats.benefits: You have learned Artokus Kirran's most hidden secrets, granting you the ability to create alchemy infused with the power of wishes.

barbarianFeats.name: Acute Vision
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your sense improve when you are raging.

barbarianFeats.name: Adrenaline Rush
barbarianFeats.benefits: In the heat of battle, you are capable of amazing feats of strength.

barbarianFeats.name: Draconic Arrogance
barbarianFeats.benefits: Few can sway you from your goals while the fury of combat fills you.

barbarianFeats.name: Moment of Clarity
barbarianFeats.benefits: You push back your rage for a moment in order to think clearly.

barbarianFeats.name: Raging Intimidation
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your fury fills your foes with fear.

barbarianFeats.name: Raging Thrower
barbarianFeats.benefits: Thrown weapons become especially deadly in your fury. You apply the additional damage from Rage to your thrown weapon attacks. If you have the Brutal Critical feat or the devastator class feature, apply their benefits to thrown weapon attacks.

barbarianFeats.name: Sudden Charge
barbarianFeats.benefits: With a quick sprint, you dash up to your foe and swing.

barbarianFeats.name: Acute Scent
barbarianFeats.benefits: When you Rage, your sense of smell improves.

barbarianFeats.name: Bashing Charge
barbarianFeats.benefits: You smash, bust, and charge through solid obstacles without hesitation.

barbarianFeats.name: Furious Finish
barbarianFeats.benefits: Desperate to finish the fight, you pour all your rage into one final blow.

barbarianFeats.name: No Escape
barbarianFeats.benefits: You keep pace with a retreating foe.

barbarianFeats.name: Second Wind
barbarianFeats.benefits: You can enter a second rage, but afterward you need to catch your breath.

barbarianFeats.name: Shake it Off
barbarianFeats.benefits: You concentrate on your rage, overcoming fear and fighting back sickness.

barbarianFeats.name: Barreling Charge
barbarianFeats.benefits: You rush forward, moving enemies aside to reach your foe.

barbarianFeats.name: Farabellus Flip
barbarianFeats.prerequisites: trained in medium armor; trained in Acrobatics
barbarianFeats.benefits: Surprisingly agile even in a breastplate and carrying a full rucksack, Marcos Farabellus developed this evasive maneuver during one of his many adventures

barbarianFeats.name: Fast Movement
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your rage is a frenzy of rapid movements.

barbarianFeats.name: Oversized Throw
barbarianFeats.benefits: With a great heave, you seize a piece of your surroundings, such as a boulder, log, table, wagon, or chunk of earth, and hurl it at your foes.

barbarianFeats.name: Raging Athlete
barbarianFeats.benefits: Physical obstacles can’t hold back your fury.

barbarianFeats.name: Spiritual Guides
barbarianFeats.benefits: Though no one sees them and only you can hear them, the spirits around you constantly chatter, save when you are raging.

barbarianFeats.name: Supernatural Senses
barbarianFeats.prerequisites: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your scent is preternaturally sharp, and you can always rely on your sense of smell to help guide you when your vision is compromised.

barbarianFeats.name: Swipe
barbarianFeats.benefits: You make a wide, arcing swing.

barbarianFeats.name: Wounded Rage
barbarianFeats.benefits: You roar in pain, awakening the rage within you.

barbarianFeats.name: Animal Skin
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your proficiency in unarmored defense increases to expert.

barbarianFeats.name: Attack of Opportunity
barbarianFeats.benefits: You swat a foe that leaves an opening.

barbarianFeats.name: Brutal Bully
barbarianFeats.benefits: You push your foes around and leave bruises.

barbarianFeats.name: Cleave
barbarianFeats.benefits: You swing clear through one foe and into another.

barbarianFeats.name: Dragon's Rage Breath
barbarianFeats.benefits: You exhale powerful draconic energy.

barbarianFeats.name: Giant's Stature
barbarianFeats.benefits: You grow to incredible size.

barbarianFeats.name: Inner Strength
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your strength is part of your rage, so as long as your anger remains, you can gather your strength and rage to overcome any sort of enfeeblement.

barbarianFeats.name: Mage Hunter
barbarianFeats.benefits: You use your hatred of magic to lash out at the sight of spellcasting, allowing you to interrupt an enemy's spell.

barbarianFeats.name: Nocturnal Sense
barbarianFeats.prerequisites: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent and low-light vision
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your senses gain even greater clarity.

barbarianFeats.name: Scouring Rage
barbarianFeats.prerequisites: an instinct that allows you to change your additional damage from Rage to a different damage type
barbarianFeats.benefits: You emit a powerful surge of instinctual energy when you unleash your potential.

barbarianFeats.name: Spirits' Interference
barbarianFeats.benefits: You call forth protective spirits to ward off ranged attacks.

barbarianFeats.name: Animal Rage
barbarianFeats.benefits: You transform into your animal.

barbarianFeats.name: Disarming Assault
barbarianFeats.benefits: You attack with enough force to knock the weapon out of your foe's hands.

barbarianFeats.name: Follow-Up Assault
barbarianFeats.benefits: Even in the face of failure you press the attack, determined to succeed.

barbarianFeats.name: Friendly Toss
barbarianFeats.benefits: You toss your friends around the battlefield.

barbarianFeats.name: Furious Bully
barbarianFeats.benefits: You bully foes across the battlefield.

barbarianFeats.name: Instinctive Strike
barbarianFeats.prerequisites: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
barbarianFeats.benefits: You trust your instincts and your sense of smell, using all of your senses to pinpoint your opponent's location.

barbarianFeats.name: Renewed Vigor
barbarianFeats.benefits: You pause to recover your raging vigor.

barbarianFeats.name: Share Rage
barbarianFeats.benefits: You stoke an ally’s fury.

barbarianFeats.name: Sudden Leap
barbarianFeats.benefits: You swing at a foe while mid-leap.

barbarianFeats.name: Thrash
barbarianFeats.benefits: You thrash the grabbed foe around.

barbarianFeats.name: Come and Get Me
barbarianFeats.benefits: You open yourself to attacks so you can respond in turn.

barbarianFeats.name: Determined Dash
barbarianFeats.benefits: Nothing can keep you from your enemy.

barbarianFeats.name: Furious Sprint
barbarianFeats.benefits: You rush forward.

barbarianFeats.name: Great Cleave
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your fury carries your weapon through multiple foes.

barbarianFeats.name: Impressive Landing
barbarianFeats.benefits: You slam into the ground, shattering it around you.

barbarianFeats.name: Knockback
barbarianFeats.benefits: The weight of your swing drives your enemy back.

barbarianFeats.name: Overpowering Charge
barbarianFeats.benefits: You trample your foes as you charge past them.

barbarianFeats.name: Resounding Blow
barbarianFeats.benefits: You strike your enemy in the head with such force that their ears ring.

barbarianFeats.name: Silencing Strike
barbarianFeats.benefits: A quick strike to the face or mouth silences your opponent.

barbarianFeats.name: Tangle of Battle
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your incredibly vicious Strike pulls you right in close, giving you the opportunity to grab your foe.

barbarianFeats.name: Terrifying Howl
barbarianFeats.benefits: You unleash a terrifying howl.

barbarianFeats.name: Dragon's Rage Wings
barbarianFeats.benefits: You sprout dragon wings from your back.

barbarianFeats.name: Embrace the Pain
barbarianFeats.benefits: Ignoring your pain, you reach out and grab the creature or weapon that caused you harm.

barbarianFeats.name: Furious Grab
barbarianFeats.benefits: You grab your foe while it’s distracted by your attack.

barbarianFeats.name: Predator's Pounce
barbarianFeats.benefits: You close the distance to your prey in a blur.

barbarianFeats.name: Spirit's Wrath
barbarianFeats.benefits: You call forth an ephemeral apparition.

barbarianFeats.name: Sunder Spell
barbarianFeats.benefits: You draw upon your superstitious fury to destroy a spell.

barbarianFeats.name: Titan's Stature
barbarianFeats.benefits: You grow to even greater size.

barbarianFeats.name: Unbalancing Sweep
barbarianFeats.benefits: You make a great sweep about yourself, knocking creatures off their feet and away from you.

barbarianFeats.name: Awesome Blow
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your attacks are so powerful, they can flatten your opponents.

barbarianFeats.name: Giant's Lunge
barbarianFeats.benefits: You extend your body and prepare to attack foes outside your normal reach.

barbarianFeats.name: Impaling Thrust
barbarianFeats.benefits: You impale your enemy and hold them in place with your weapon.

barbarianFeats.name: Sunder Enchantment
barbarianFeats.benefits: You can focus your superstition to break the magic of an item, in addition to destroying freestanding spells and those active on creatures.

barbarianFeats.name: Vengeful Strike
barbarianFeats.benefits: When struck by an enemy, you respond in turn.

barbarianFeats.name: Whirlwind Strike
barbarianFeats.benefits: You attack all nearby adversaries.

barbarianFeats.name: Collateral Thrash
barbarianFeats.benefits: When you Thrash a grabbed foe, you smack that foe into another nearby.

barbarianFeats.name: Dragon Transformation
barbarianFeats.benefits: You transform into a ferocious large dragon.

barbarianFeats.name: Furious Vengeance
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your enemy's blow fuels your rage and provokes your immediate retaliation.

barbarianFeats.name: Penetrating Projectile
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your projectiles are unhindered by flesh and bone.

barbarianFeats.name: Reckless Abandon
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your blood boils when you take a beating, and you throw caution to the wind to finish the fight.

barbarianFeats.name: Shattering Blows
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your forceful blows shatter objects with ease.

barbarianFeats.name: Brutal Critical
barbarianFeats.benefits: Your critical hits are particularly devastating.

barbarianFeats.name: Perfect Clarity
barbarianFeats.benefits: You burn out all of your rage to ensure that your attack lands and your mind remains free.

barbarianFeats.name: Vicious Evisceration
barbarianFeats.benefits: You make a vicious attack that maims your enemy.

barbarianFeats.name: Annihilating Swing
barbarianFeats.benefits: You have learned from the brute destructive power of xulgaths and their kind.

barbarianFeats.name: Contagious Rage
barbarianFeats.benefits: You can drive your allies into a frenzy, granting them incredible benefits.

barbarianFeats.name: Invulnerable Juggernaut
barbarianFeats.benefits: Gain resistance to all damage.

barbarianFeats.name: Quaking Stomp
barbarianFeats.benefits: You stomp the ground with such force that it creates a minor earthquake.

barbarianFeats.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
barbarianFeats.benefits: You have become a brutal, unstoppable force of nature, able to shrug off mortal wounds with ease.

bardFeats.name: Bardic Lore
bardFeats.benefits: Your studies make you informed on every subject.

bardFeats.name: Hymn of Healing
bardFeats.benefits: You learn the hymn of healing composition spell (page 228), which imbues your music with rich melodies that help your allies recover from harm.

bardFeats.name: Lingering Composition
bardFeats.benefits: By adding a flourish, you make your compositions last longer.

bardFeats.name: Martial Performance
bardFeats.benefits: Your muse has taught you how to handle a wider variety of weapons than most bards, empowering you to effortlessly blend your performance into combat even with the most inelegant tools.

bardFeats.name: Reach Spell
bardFeats.benefits: You can extend your spells’ range.

bardFeats.name: Versatile Performance
bardFeats.benefits: You can rely on the grandeur of your performances rather than ordinary social skills.

bardFeats.name: Well-Versed
bardFeats.benefits: You're resilient to performative influences that aren't your own.

bardFeats.name: Cantrip Expansion
bardFeats.benefits: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

bardFeats.name: Directed Audience
bardFeats.benefits: You can shape the area of your composition spells.

bardFeats.name: Esoteric Polymath
bardFeats.benefits: You keep a book of occult spells, similar to a wizard’s spellbook.

bardFeats.name: Inspire Competence
bardFeats.benefits: You learn to aid your allies’ skills with your performance.

bardFeats.name: Loremaster's Etude
bardFeats.benefits: You magically unlock memories, making them easier to recall.

bardFeats.name: Multifarious Muse
bardFeats.benefits: Your muse doesn’t fall into a single label.

bardFeats.name: Song of Strength
bardFeats.benefits: Your performances inspire strength in your allies.

bardFeats.name: Combat Reading
bardFeats.benefits: You use a performer's cold reading techniques, aura reading, and other tricks to discover your foe's strengths and weaknesses.

bardFeats.name: Courageous Advance
bardFeats.benefits: With a rousing call, you exhort an ally to advance.

bardFeats.name: Inspire Defense
bardFeats.benefits: You learn to protect yourself and your allies with your performance.

bardFeats.name: Melodious Spell
bardFeats.benefits: You subtly weave your spellcasting into your performance.

bardFeats.name: Ritual Researcher
bardFeats.benefits: Careful research into the art of rituals has made you better at performing them.

bardFeats.name: Triple Time
bardFeats.benefits: You learn to speed up yourself and your allies with your performance.

bardFeats.name: Versatile Signature
bardFeats.benefits: You’re always tweaking your available repertoire.

bardFeats.name: Assured Knowledge
bardFeats.benefits: You can procure information with confidence.

bardFeats.name: Defensive Coordination
bardFeats.benefits: Like the storied heroes who persist in the face of overwhelming odds, you and your allies will hold the line.

bardFeats.name: Dirge of Doom
bardFeats.benefits: You learn to frighten your enemies with your performance.

bardFeats.name: Educate Allies
bardFeats.benefits: You tweak the properties of your composition spell to convey a bit of your defensive knowledge.

bardFeats.name: Harmonize
bardFeats.benefits: You can perform multiple compositions simultaneously.

bardFeats.name: Song of Marching
bardFeats.benefits: You learn the song of marching composition cantrip (page 228), which enables you and your allies to cross vast distances without strain.

bardFeats.name: Steady Spellcasting
bardFeats.benefits: You don’t lose spells easily.

bardFeats.name: Accompany
bardFeats.benefits: You use your performances to supplement an ally's spellcasting, providing magical energy for their spells.

bardFeats.name: Call and Response
bardFeats.benefits: Your composition takes the form of a call-and-response chant, which lets your allies continue the effect without you.

bardFeats.name: Courageous Opportunity
bardFeats.benefits: You bellow a ferocious call to arms, inspiring yourself to lash out at a foe.

bardFeats.name: Eclectic Skill
bardFeats.benefits: Your broad experiences translate to a range of skills.

bardFeats.name: Inspire Heroics
bardFeats.benefits: Your performances inspire even greater deeds in your allies.

bardFeats.name: Know-It-All
bardFeats.benefits: Your knowledge of the world expands beyond what you have read.

bardFeats.name: Soulsight
bardFeats.prerequisites: [Sorcerer] bloodline that grants divine or occult spells
bardFeats.benefits: Your muse has opened your senses to the world beyond.

bardFeats.name: Annotate Composition
bardFeats.benefits: By putting composition to paper, you can create a source of stirring words or song that others can read and understand.

bardFeats.name: Courageous Assault
bardFeats.benefits: With a mighty shout, you can stir an ally to attack.

bardFeats.name: House of Imaginary Walls
bardFeats.benefits: You erect an imaginary barrier others believe to be real.

bardFeats.name: Ode to Ouroboros
bardFeats.benefits: You learn the ode to ouroboros composition spell (page 228), which enables you to temporarily spare your allies from death.

bardFeats.name: Quickened Casting
bardFeats.benefits: You are able to quickly cast a spell.

bardFeats.name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
bardFeats.benefits: You learn the symphony of the unfettered heart composition spell (page 228), which enables you to protect an ally against incapacitating conditions.

bardFeats.name: Unusual Composition
bardFeats.benefits: You can translate the emotion and power of a composition to other mediums.

bardFeats.name: Eclectic Polymath
bardFeats.benefits: Your flexible mind can quickly shift spells.

bardFeats.name: Enigma's Knowledge
bardFeats.benefits: Your muse whispers knowledge to you at all the right times.

bardFeats.name: Inspirational Focus
bardFeats.benefits: Your connection to your muse has granted you unusual focus.

bardFeats.name: Reverberate
bardFeats.benefits: You can manipulate the acoustics around you to deflect sonic damage back at its source.

bardFeats.name: Shared Assault
bardFeats.benefits: In the triumph of battle, you can share the glory with another ally.

bardFeats.name: Silver's Refrain
bardFeats.benefits: Learn the silver's refrain composition cantrip.

bardFeats.name: Allegro
bardFeats.benefits: You can quicken your allies with a fast-paced performance.

bardFeats.name: Earworm
bardFeats.benefits: By endlessly repeating a motif, you implant an earworm, a memorable song that repeats over and over again in your allies' heads, preparing them to respond to it later.

bardFeats.name: Soothing Ballad
bardFeats.benefits: You soothe your allies’ wounds with the power of your performance.

bardFeats.name: Triumphant Inspiration
bardFeats.benefits: With a triumphant shout, you inspire your allies.

bardFeats.name: True Hypercognition
bardFeats.benefits: Your mind works at an incredible pace.

bardFeats.name: Vigorous Inspiration
bardFeats.benefits: You instill magical vigor in your allies when you inspire them to attack.

bardFeats.name: Courageous Onslaught
bardFeats.benefits: You use your performance to orchestrate an onslaught against your enemies.

bardFeats.name: Effortless Concentration
bardFeats.benefits: You can maintain a spell with hardly a thought.

bardFeats.name: Resounding Finale
bardFeats.benefits: You bring your performance to a sudden, dramatic finish, drowning out other sounds.

bardFeats.name: Studious Capacity
bardFeats.benefits: Your continued study of occult magic has increased your magical capacity.

bardFeats.name: All in my Head
bardFeats.benefits: Using your occult connections and incredible powers of persuasion, you convince yourself that the triggering damage is a figment of your imagination.

bardFeats.name: Deep Lore
bardFeats.benefits: Your repertoire is vast, containing far more spells than usual.

bardFeats.name: Discordant Voice
bardFeats.benefits: Your inspire courage lets loose a discordant shriek that imbues your allies' attacks with powerful sonic reverberations.

bardFeats.name: Eternal Composition
bardFeats.benefits: The world is a stage upon which you are always playing.

bardFeats.name: Impossible Polymath
bardFeats.prerequisites: Esoteric Polymath; trained in Arcana, Occultism, or Religion
bardFeats.benefits: Your esoteric formulas are so unusual that they allow you to dabble in magic from diverse traditions.

bardFeats.name: Fatal Aria
bardFeats.benefits: Your songs overwhelm the target with unbearable emotion.

bardFeats.name: Perfect Encore
bardFeats.benefits: You develop another incredible creation.

bardFeats.name: Pied Piping
bardFeats.benefits: You learn the pied piping composition spell (page 228), which enables you to control the actions of weak-minded individuals.

bardFeats.name: Ringmaster's Introduction
bardFeats.benefits: You announce the triggering ally with a litany of their legendary achievements, spurring them to action.

bardFeats.name: Song of the Fallen
bardFeats.benefits: Gain the song of the fallen focus spell.

bardFeats.name: Symphony of the Muses
bardFeats.benefits: You are able to weave countless performances together into a solo symphony.

bardFeats.name: Ultimate Polymath
bardFeats.benefits: You can flexibly cast all of your spells, granting a dizzying array of possible options.

championFeats.name: Deity's Domain
championFeats.benefits: You embody an aspect of your deity.

championFeats.name: Desperate Prayer
championFeats.benefits: You call out to your deity in a plea for their aid.

championFeats.name: Everstand Stance
championFeats.benefits: You brace your shield with both hands, enhancing its potential for both offense and defense.

championFeats.name: Iron Repercussions
championFeats.benefits: Disobeying your Iron Command has lasting consequences.

championFeats.name: Ongoing Selfishness
championFeats.benefits: Your powerful personality and incredible ego demand that you protect yourself above all else.

championFeats.name: Ranged Reprisal
championFeats.benefits: You can use Retributive Strike with a ranged weapon.

championFeats.name: Splinter Faith
championFeats.benefits: Your faith in your deity is represented in an extremely unusual way that some might call heretical

championFeats.name: Unimpeded Step
championFeats.benefits: With a burst of divine liberation, your spur your ally’s movement.

championFeats.name: Vicious Vengeance
championFeats.benefits: While your vengeance is painful for both you and your foe, none can doubt that your enemies suffer more.

championFeats.name: Weight of Guilt
championFeats.benefits: Guilt clouds the minds of those who ignore your Glimpse of Redemption.

championFeats.name: Conceited Mindset
championFeats.benefits: Because you know your mind is superior, you scoff at anyone who would alter your mental state—but this hubris gets the better of you when you're wrong.

championFeats.name: Divine Grace
championFeats.benefits: You call upon your deity’s grace.

championFeats.name: Dragonslayer Oath
championFeats.benefits: You’ve sworn to slay evil dragons.

championFeats.name: Esoteric Oath
championFeats.benefits: You've sworn an oath to slay the alien abominations that lurk in the remote corners of Golarion.

championFeats.name: Fiendsbane Oath
championFeats.benefits: You’ve sworn an oath to banish the corruption of fiends to the dark planes they call home.

championFeats.name: Lightslayer Oath
championFeats.benefits: You've sworn to rid the world of the self-righteousness of celestial beings.

championFeats.name: Shining Oath
championFeats.benefits: You’ve sworn an oath to put the undead to rest.

championFeats.name: Vengeful Oath
championFeats.benefits: You’ve sworn an oath to hunt down wicked evildoers and bring them to judgment.

championFeats.name: Accelerating Touch
championFeats.benefits: Your healing energies are infused with bounding energy.

championFeats.name: Aura of Courage
championFeats.benefits: You stand strong in the face of danger and inspire your allies to do the same.

championFeats.name: Aura of Despair
championFeats.benefits: Your presence as an avatar of evil makes your foes more susceptible to terror and makes it almost impossible for them to shake off fear when you are near.

championFeats.name: Cruelty
championFeats.benefits: The harm you deal with your corrupting touch saps the strength from your enemy's body.

championFeats.name: Divine Health
championFeats.benefits: Your faith makes you resistant to disease.

championFeats.name: Everstand Strike
championFeats.benefits: Your follow-up blow leaves you an opening to set your shield.

championFeats.name: Light of Revelation
championFeats.benefits: You’ve learned to call upon light to reveal what is hidden.

championFeats.name: Mercy
championFeats.benefits: Your touch relieves fear and restores movement.

championFeats.name: Sun Blade
championFeats.benefits: You can unleash burning sunlight from your sword or spear.

championFeats.name: Attack of Opportunity
championFeats.benefits: You swat a foe that leaves an opening.

championFeats.name: Corrupted Shield
championFeats.benefits: Your shield ally is more than just a spirit of protection— it's a conduit for deadly divine magic.

championFeats.name: Invigorating Mercy
championFeats.benefits: Your divine touch rejuvenates the weak and tired.

championFeats.name: Litany Against Wrath
championFeats.benefits: You excoriate a foe for its wrath against goodly creatures.

championFeats.name: Loyal Warhorse
championFeats.benefits: You and your mount have grown closer, and your loyalty to each other is unbreakable.

championFeats.name: Shield Warden
championFeats.prerequisites: [Champion] divine ally (shield); tenets of good; [Fighter] Shield Block
championFeats.benefits: You use your shield to protect your allies as well as yourself.

championFeats.name: Smite Evil
championFeats.benefits: Your blade ally becomes an even more powerful tool against evildoers.

championFeats.name: Smite Good
championFeats.benefits: Your blade ally shares your lust for the blood of good creatures.

championFeats.name: Advanced Deity's Domain
championFeats.benefits: Through your conviction, you have glimpsed the deeper secrets of your deity’s domain.

championFeats.name: Greater Cruelty
championFeats.benefits: The extent of the corruption within you does more than simply sap your foes' strength, it devastates their minds and reflexes.

championFeats.name: Greater Mercy
championFeats.benefits: Your faith enhances your ability to remove conditions.

championFeats.name: Heal Mount
championFeats.prerequisites: divine ally (steed); devotion spell (lay on hands)
championFeats.benefits: Your devotion to your mount manifests as a surge of positive energy.

championFeats.name: Impassable Wall Stance
championFeats.benefits: You refuse to let foes past your guard.

championFeats.name: Quick Block
championFeats.benefits: You can block with your shield instinctively.

championFeats.name: Sacrifice Armor
championFeats.benefits: With divine awareness, you twist your body to lessen the impact of an attack.

championFeats.name: Second Ally
championFeats.benefits: Your inner grace attracts the attention of a second protective spirit.

championFeats.name: Sense Evil
championFeats.benefits: You sense evil as a queasy or foreboding feeling.

championFeats.name: Sense Good
championFeats.benefits: The presence of goodness sickens you with its saccharine self-righteousness.

championFeats.name: Devoted Focus
championFeats.benefits: Your devotion is strong enough to increase your focus to incredible heights.

championFeats.name: Elucidating Mercy
championFeats.benefits: Your mercy grants clarity to those around you just when they need it most.

championFeats.name: Imposing Destrier
championFeats.benefits: Under your care, your mount has realized its innate potential.

championFeats.name: Litany Against Sloth
championFeats.benefits: You rail against the sin of sloth, turning a foe’s laziness against it.

championFeats.name: Litany of Self-Interest
championFeats.benefits: You compel a creature to act toward its own ends rather than consider others.

championFeats.name: Radiant Blade Spirit
championFeats.benefits: Your divine ally radiates power, enhancing your chosen weapon.

championFeats.name: Resilient Touch
championFeats.benefits: Your healing energies create an aura of protection that defends your allies against more than just blades and arrows.

championFeats.name: Shield of Reckoning
championFeats.benefits: When you shield your ally against an attack, you call upon your power to protect your ally further.

championFeats.name: Affliction Mercy
championFeats.benefits: The divine grace that flows through you grants reprieve from an affliction.

championFeats.name: Amplifying Touch
championFeats.benefits: Your healing energies empower attacks.

championFeats.name: Aura of Faith
championFeats.benefits: You radiate an aura of pure belief that imbues your attacks and those of nearby allies with holy power.

championFeats.name: Blade of Justice
championFeats.benefits: You call upon divine power and make a weapon or unarmed Strike against a foe you have witnessed harming an ally or innocent.

championFeats.name: Champion's Sacrifice
championFeats.benefits: You can suffer so that others might live.

championFeats.name: Divine Wall
championFeats.benefits: You use your shield to harry your enemies, preventing them from stepping away from or around you.

championFeats.name: Enforce Oath
championFeats.prerequisites: You've sworn to an oath against a specific type of creature.
championFeats.benefits: You call on your oath to embolden you in combat.

championFeats.name: Gruesome Strike
championFeats.prerequisites: tenets of evil; champion's reaction that grants extra damage with your Strikes
championFeats.benefits: Make a Strike against the creature that triggered your champion's reaction.

championFeats.name: Lasting Doubt
championFeats.benefits: When you cast doubt upon your foes, the effect lasts longer than usual.

championFeats.name: Liberating Stride
championFeats.benefits: Your allies can move farther when you release them from harm.

championFeats.name: Pale Horse
championFeats.benefits: Your mount becomes a grotesque creature of foreboding when you ride it.

championFeats.name: Anchoring Aura
championFeats.benefits: Your aura hampers fiends’ teleportation.

championFeats.name: Aura of Life
championFeats.benefits: Your aura protects against necromantic effects.

championFeats.name: Aura of Preservation
championFeats.benefits: Your aura protects against the twisting powers of aberrations.

championFeats.name: Aura of Righteousness
championFeats.benefits: Your righteous aura dampens evil’s might.

championFeats.name: Aura of Vengeance
championFeats.benefits: When you call upon others to take retribution, you also guide their aim.

championFeats.name: Divine Reflexes
championFeats.benefits: You can use your champion's reaction more.

championFeats.name: Greater Interpose
championFeats.benefits: Your divine grace empowers you to avoid hits when you otherwise could not.

championFeats.name: Litany of Depravity
championFeats.benefits: You undercut your enemy's vain moralism, opening their heart to evil.

championFeats.name: Litany of Righteousness
championFeats.benefits: You call upon righteousness to expose an evil foe’s weakness.

championFeats.name: Wyrmbane Aura
championFeats.benefits: Your aura protects against destructive energies and dragons’ breath.

championFeats.name: Auspicious Mount
championFeats.benefits: Guided by your ongoing care, your steed has developed incredible intelligence and skill.

championFeats.name: Expand Aura
championFeats.prerequisites: You have at least one aura from a champion feat or feature.
championFeats.benefits: You focus your divine power to extend your influence.

championFeats.name: Instrument of Slaughter
championFeats.benefits: Your blade ally thirsts for the blood of your foes.

championFeats.name: Instrument of Zeal
championFeats.benefits: Divine energy fills your weapon.

championFeats.name: Shield of Grace
championFeats.benefits: You protect an ally with both your shield and your body.

championFeats.name: Celestial Form
championFeats.benefits: You take on a celestial countenance, appearing like a type of celestial who serves your deity.

championFeats.name: Fiendish Form
championFeats.benefits: Your features reshape into those of a type of fiend who serves your deity; for example, as a demon you might have putrid scales, twisted horns, and red eyes.

championFeats.name: Rejuvenating Touch
championFeats.benefits: Your healing energies linger after you cast, providing continual benefits.

championFeats.name: Ultimate Mercy
championFeats.benefits: Your mercy transcends the bounds of life and death.

championFeats.name: Aura of Unbreakable Virtue
championFeats.benefits: Overwhelm evil creatures with your aura.

championFeats.name: Banishing Blow
championFeats.benefits: The erratic teleportation magic you experienced in the Kortos Mounts has taught you a few tricks.

championFeats.name: Celestial Mount
championFeats.benefits: Your steed gains incredible celestial powers granted by your deity.

championFeats.name: Fiendish Mount
championFeats.benefits: Your steed ally manifests a suite of powerful and sinister gifts granted to it by your deity.

championFeats.name: Radiant Blade Master
championFeats.benefits: Your divine ally turns your chosen weapon into a paragon of its type.

championFeats.name: Sacred Defender
championFeats.benefits: You are a great warrior that can stand strong against the fiercest opponents to your cause.

championFeats.name: Shield Paragon
championFeats.benefits: Your shield is a vessel of divine protection.

clericFeats.name: Deadly Simplicity
clericFeats.prerequisites: deity with a simple or unarmed attack favored weapon, trained with your deity's favored weapon
clericFeats.benefits: Your deity’s weapon is especially powerful in your hands.

clericFeats.name: Domain Initiate
clericFeats.benefits: Your deity bestows a special spell related to their powers.

clericFeats.name: False Faith
clericFeats.benefits: Droskar knows you may need to disguise yourself in societies that oppose your faith.

clericFeats.name: Harming Hands
clericFeats.benefits: The mordant power of your negative energy grows.

clericFeats.name: Healing Hands
clericFeats.benefits: Your positive energy is even more vibrant and restorative.

clericFeats.name: Holy Castigation
clericFeats.benefits: You combine holy energy with positive energy to damage demons, devils, and their evil ilk.

clericFeats.name: Premonition of Avoidance
clericFeats.benefits: Your deity grants you limited foresight, warning you of dangers an instant before they occur.

clericFeats.name: Reach Spell
clericFeats.benefits: You can extend your spells’ range.

clericFeats.name: Splinter Faith
clericFeats.benefits: Your faith in your deity is represented in an extremely unusual way that some might call heretical

clericFeats.name: Syncretism
clericFeats.benefits: You have come to see the overlap between two deities’ teachings

clericFeats.name: Vile Desecration
clericFeats.benefits: You combine unholy might with negative energy to damage angels, archons, and other self-righteous denizens of the Outer Planes.

clericFeats.name: Cantrip Expansion
clericFeats.benefits: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

clericFeats.name: Communal Healing
clericFeats.benefits: You’re a conduit for positive energy, and as you channel it through you, it heals some of your minor injuries.

clericFeats.name: Emblazon Armament
clericFeats.benefits: Carefully etching a sacred image into a physical object, you steel yourself for battle.

clericFeats.name: Rapid Response
clericFeats.benefits: You work quickly and efficiently in times of danger to deliver needed assistance.

clericFeats.name: Sap Life
clericFeats.benefits: You draw the life force out of your enemies to heal your own wounds.

clericFeats.name: Turn Undead
clericFeats.benefits: Undead harmed by your positive energy might flee, compelled by an innate aversion to the force opposite undeath.

clericFeats.name: Versatile Font
clericFeats.prerequisites: harmful font or healing font; deity that allows clerics to have both fonts
clericFeats.benefits: As you explore your deity’s aspects, you move beyond restrictions on healing or harming.

clericFeats.name: Channel Smite
clericFeats.benefits: You siphon the destructive energies of positive or negative energy through a melee attack and into your foe.

clericFeats.name: Command Undead
clericFeats.benefits: You grasp the animating force within an undead creature and bend it to your will.

clericFeats.name: Directed Channel
clericFeats.benefits: You can shape the energy you channel in a single direction, reaching farther and in a more directed fashion.

clericFeats.name: Expanded Domain Initiate
clericFeats.benefits: You have long venerated one of your deity’s lesser-known aspects

clericFeats.name: Improved Communal Healing
clericFeats.benefits: You can direct excess channeled energy outward to benefit an ally.

clericFeats.name: Necrotic Infusion
clericFeats.benefits: You pour negative energy into your undead subject to empower its attacks.

clericFeats.name: Radiant Infusion
clericFeats.benefits: You pour invigorating positive energy into a living ally.

clericFeats.name: Cast Down
clericFeats.benefits: The sheer force of your faith can bring a foe crashing down.

clericFeats.name: Divine Weapon
clericFeats.benefits: You siphon residual spell energy into a weapon you’re wielding.

clericFeats.name: Magic Hands
clericFeats.benefits: The blessing of your deity heightens your healing ability, making your mundane healing work as if by magic.

clericFeats.name: Selective Energy
clericFeats.benefits: As you call down divine power, you can prevent some enemies from benefiting or some allies from being hurt.

clericFeats.name: Steady Spellcasting
clericFeats.benefits: You don’t lose spells easily.

clericFeats.name: Advanced Domain
clericFeats.benefits: Your studies or prayers have unlocked deeper secrets of your deity’s domain.

clericFeats.name: Align Armament
clericFeats.prerequisites: chaotic, evil, good, or lawful deity
clericFeats.benefits: You bring a weapon into metaphysical concordance with your deity’s beliefs.

clericFeats.name: Channeled Succor
clericFeats.benefits: You can remove conditions with divine grace.

clericFeats.name: Cremate Undead
clericFeats.benefits: Your positive energy sets undead alight.

clericFeats.name: Emblazon Energy
clericFeats.benefits: With elemental forces, you make your emblazoned symbols more potent.

clericFeats.name: Martyr
clericFeats.benefits: You go to extreme lengths to support your allies, even when it means bringing harm to yourself.

clericFeats.name: Surging Focus
clericFeats.benefits: When an ally you can see falls in battle, your fight or flight response triggers a surge in your deity's might within you.

clericFeats.name: Castigating Weapon
clericFeats.benefits: The force of your deity’s castigation strengthens your body so you can strike down the wicked.

clericFeats.name: Heroic Recovery
clericFeats.benefits: The restorative power of your healing invigorates the recipient.

clericFeats.name: Improved Command Undead
clericFeats.prerequisites: harmful font; Command Undead; evil alignment
clericFeats.benefits: Undead creatures find it all but impossible to resist your commands.

clericFeats.name: Replenishment of War
clericFeats.prerequisites: expert in your deity’s favored weapon
clericFeats.benefits: Striking out against your enemies draws praise and protection from your deity.

clericFeats.name: Shared Avoidance
clericFeats.benefits: You can project your premonitions of danger to your allies.

clericFeats.name: Shield of Faith
clericFeats.benefits: Residual energy from your domain spells bolsters your defenses.

clericFeats.name: Through Spell
clericFeats.benefits: Spells you cast can transform briefly into vital essence, traveling harmlessly through living and undead creatures between you and your target, blocked only by solid objects.

clericFeats.name: Defensive Recovery
clericFeats.benefits: Your faith provides temporary protection in addition to healing.

clericFeats.name: Domain Focus
clericFeats.benefits: Your devotion to your deity’s domains grows greater, and so does the power granted to you.

clericFeats.name: Emblazon Antimagic
clericFeats.benefits: Your deity’s symbol protects against offensive magic.

clericFeats.name: Shared Replenishment
clericFeats.benefits: When your deity blesses your warlike acts, you can extend that favor to your allies.

clericFeats.name: Deity's Protection
clericFeats.benefits: When you call upon your deity’s power to fulfill the promise of their domain, you gain divine protection.

clericFeats.name: Ebb and Flow
clericFeats.benefits: You can pull forth both positive and negative energy simultaneously to harm your enemies and heal your allies.

clericFeats.name: Extend Armament Alignment
clericFeats.benefits: The alignment you impose on a weapon lasts much longer.

clericFeats.name: Fast Channel
clericFeats.benefits: Divine power is always at your fingertips, swiftly responding to your call.

clericFeats.name: Premonition of Clarity
clericFeats.benefits: Your deity sends you a vision of faith to steel you against mental attacks.

clericFeats.name: Swift Banishment
clericFeats.benefits: The force of your blow sends your victim back to its home plane.

clericFeats.name: Eternal Bane
clericFeats.benefits: A life of evil has made you a nexus for your deity’s vile power.

clericFeats.name: Eternal Blessing
clericFeats.benefits: Your good deeds have brought your deity’s grace to you for all of eternity.

clericFeats.name: Remediate
clericFeats.benefits: If your next action is to use your divine font to cast a 3-action heal or harm spell to damage creatures, you can harness the residual energy to counterbalance opposing forces.

clericFeats.name: Resurrectionist
clericFeats.benefits: You can cause a creature you bring back from the brink of death to thrive and continue healing.

clericFeats.name: Domain Wellspring
clericFeats.benefits: The intensity of your focus grows from the investment you’ve placed in your domains.

clericFeats.name: Echoing Channel
clericFeats.benefits: When you pull forth positive or negative energy, you also create a smaller pocket of that energy.

clericFeats.name: Improved Swift Banishment
clericFeats.benefits: You easily banish creatures with your weapon.

clericFeats.name: Miraculous Possibility
clericFeats.benefits: Your deity empowers you to perform minor miracles, allowing you to readily adapt to the fluctuating needs of your duties.

clericFeats.name: Shared Clarity
clericFeats.benefits: You can project your premonitions of clarity to your allies.

clericFeats.name: Avatar's Audience
clericFeats.benefits: Your extensive service has made you a lesser herald of your deity, which affords you certain privileges.

clericFeats.name: Denier of Destruction
clericFeats.benefits: You can manipulate the same energies that the aeon orbs use to sustain life.

clericFeats.name: Emblazon Divinity
clericFeats.benefits: Emblazon more equipment at the same time.

clericFeats.name: Maker of Miracles
clericFeats.benefits: You are a conduit for truly deific power.

clericFeats.name: Metamagic Channel
clericFeats.benefits: Deep understanding of divine revelations into the nature of vital essence allows you to freely manipulate the effects of your positive or negative energy.

druidFeats.name: Animal Companion
druidFeats.benefits: You gain the service of a young animal companion that travels with you.

druidFeats.name: Leshy Familiar
druidFeats.benefits: You gain a leshy familiar, a tiny plant that embodies one of the many spirits of nature.

druidFeats.name: Reach Spell
druidFeats.benefits: You can extend your spells’ range.

druidFeats.name: Storm Born
druidFeats.benefits: You are at home out in the elements, reveling in the power of nature unleashed.

druidFeats.name: Verdant Weapon
druidFeats.benefits: You cultivate a seed that can sprout into a wooden staff, vine whip, or another weapon.

druidFeats.name: Widen Spell
druidFeats.benefits: You manipulate the energy of your spell, causing it to spread out and affect a wider area.

druidFeats.name: Wild Shape
druidFeats.benefits: You are one with the wild, always changing and adapting to meet any challenge.

druidFeats.name: Call of the Wild
druidFeats.benefits: You call upon the creatures of nature to come to your aid.

druidFeats.name: Enhanced Familiar
druidFeats.benefits: You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities.

druidFeats.name: Order Explorer
druidFeats.benefits: You have learned the secrets of another druidic order.

druidFeats.name: Poison Resistance
druidFeats.benefits: Repeated exposure to toxic reagents has fortified your body against poisons of all kinds.

druidFeats.name: Elemental Summons
druidFeats.benefits: You can call the four elements to you.

druidFeats.name: Form Control
druidFeats.benefits: With additional care and effort, you can take on an alternate form for a longer period of time.

druidFeats.name: Leshy Familiar Secrets
druidFeats.benefits: The leaf order's secrets allow your familiar to take advantage of its leshy form.

druidFeats.name: Mature Animal Companion (Druid)
druidFeats.benefits: Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion, which grants it additional capabilities.

druidFeats.name: Order Magic
druidFeats.benefits: You have delved deeper into the teaching of a new order, gaining access to a coveted order spell.

druidFeats.name: Thousand Faces
druidFeats.benefits: Your form is as mutable as the weather, changing to meet your whim.

druidFeats.name: Woodland Stride
druidFeats.benefits: You can always find a path, almost as if foliage parted before you.

druidFeats.name: Current Spell
druidFeats.benefits: As you use your magic to manipulate air or water, you divert some of its currents to form a barrier around you.

druidFeats.name: Green Empathy
druidFeats.benefits: You can communicate with plants on a basic level and use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on them and to make very simple Requests of them.

druidFeats.name: Insect Shape
druidFeats.benefits: Your understanding of life expands, allowing you to mimic a wider range of creatures.

druidFeats.name: Steady Spellcasting
druidFeats.benefits: You don’t lose spells easily.

druidFeats.name: Storm Retribution
druidFeats.prerequisites: storm order; tempest surge order spell
druidFeats.benefits: You lash out, directing a burst of storming fury toward a creature that has harmed you.

druidFeats.name: Deimatic Display
druidFeats.benefits: Imitating animal threat displays, you make yourself appear larger and more imposing.

druidFeats.name: Ferocious Shape
druidFeats.benefits: You have mastered the shape of ferocious dinosaurs.

druidFeats.name: Fey Caller
druidFeats.benefits: You have learned some of the tricks the fey use to bend primal magic toward illusions and trickery.

druidFeats.name: Incredible Companion (Druid)
druidFeats.benefits: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop.

druidFeats.name: Soaring Shape
druidFeats.benefits: Wings free you from the shackles of the ground below.

druidFeats.name: Wind Caller
druidFeats.benefits: You bid the winds to lift and carry you through the air.

druidFeats.name: Elemental Shape
druidFeats.benefits: You understand the fundamental elements of nature such that you can imbue them into your body.

druidFeats.name: Healing Transformation
druidFeats.benefits: You can take advantage of shapechanging magic to close wounds and patch injuries.

druidFeats.name: Overwhelming Energy
druidFeats.benefits: You alter your spells to overcome resistances.

druidFeats.name: Plant Shape
druidFeats.benefits: You can take the form of a plant creature.

druidFeats.name: Pristine Weapon
druidFeats.benefits: Your verdant weapon can cut through the resistances of magical creatures.

druidFeats.name: Side by Side (Druid)
druidFeats.benefits: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them off balance.

druidFeats.name: Dragon Shape
druidFeats.benefits: You can take on the form of some of the world’s most fearsome creatures.

druidFeats.name: Green Tongue
druidFeats.benefits: You share a special kinship with all things green and living.

druidFeats.name: Pesh Skin
druidFeats.benefits: Your plant form sprouts hundreds of spines, and your blood causes mild hallucinations in creatures exposed to it.

druidFeats.name: Primal Focus
druidFeats.benefits: Your connection to nature is particularly strong, and the spirits of nature flock around you, helping you replenish your focus.

druidFeats.name: Primal Summons
druidFeats.benefits: Whenever you summon an ally, you can empower it with the elemental power of air, earth, fire, or water.

druidFeats.name: Wandering Oasis
druidFeats.benefits: You're surrounded by soothing energy.

druidFeats.name: Reactive Transformation
druidFeats.prerequisites: Wild Shape; Dragon Shape, Elemental Shape, Plant Shape, or Soaring Shape
druidFeats.benefits: You transform reflexively when in danger.

druidFeats.name: Sow Spell
druidFeats.benefits: You fold your spell into a seed.

druidFeats.name: Specialized Companion (Druid)
druidFeats.benefits: Your animal companion continues to grow in power and ability, and it is now cunning enough to become specialized.

druidFeats.name: Timeless Nature
druidFeats.benefits: With primal magic sustaining you, you cease aging.

druidFeats.name: Verdant Metamorphosis
druidFeats.benefits: You transform into a plant version of yourself.

druidFeats.name: Effortless Concentration
druidFeats.benefits: You can maintain a spell with hardly a thought.

druidFeats.name: Impaling Briars
druidFeats.benefits: You can fill an area with devastating briars that impale and impede your foes.

druidFeats.name: Monstrosity Shape
druidFeats.benefits: You can transform into a powerful magical creature.

druidFeats.name: Invoke Disaster
druidFeats.benefits: You can invoke nature’s fury upon your foes.

druidFeats.name: Perfect Form Control
druidFeats.benefits: Thanks to magic and muscle memory, you can stay in your alternate forms indefinitely.

druidFeats.name: Primal Aegis
druidFeats.benefits: You surround yourself with a thick field of protective primal energy.

druidFeats.name: Primal Wellspring
druidFeats.benefits: Your reservoir of Focus Points is a deep wellspring.

druidFeats.name: Apex Companion
druidFeats.benefits: Gain the apex companion focus spell.

druidFeats.name: Hierophant's Power
druidFeats.benefits: You have entwined yourself with the natural world, and its full power flows through you.

druidFeats.name: Leyline Conduit
druidFeats.benefits: You can cast your spells effortlessly by tapping into the leylines of the world.

druidFeats.name: True Shapeshifter
druidFeats.benefits: You transcend the limitations of form.

druidFeats.name: Verdant Presence
druidFeats.benefits: The life-giving properties of the aeon orbs flourish within you.

fighterFeats.name: Combat Assessment
fighterFeats.benefits: You make a telegraphed attack to learn about your foe.

fighterFeats.name: Double Slice
fighterFeats.benefits: You lash out at your foe with both weapons.

fighterFeats.name: Everstand Stance
fighterFeats.benefits: You brace your shield with both hands, enhancing its potential for both offense and defense.

fighterFeats.name: Exacting Strike
fighterFeats.benefits: You make a controlled attack, fully accounting for your momentum.

fighterFeats.name: Point-Blank Shot
fighterFeats.benefits: You take aim to pick off nearby enemies quickly.

fighterFeats.name: Power Attack
fighterFeats.benefits: You unleash a particularly powerful attack that clobbers your foe but leaves you a bit unsteady.

fighterFeats.name: Reactive Shield
fighterFeats.benefits: You can snap your shield into place just as you would take a blow, avoiding the hit at the last second.

fighterFeats.name: Snagging Strike
fighterFeats.benefits: You combine an attack with quick grappling moves to throw an enemy off balance as long as it stays in your reach.

fighterFeats.name: Sudden Charge
fighterFeats.benefits: With a quick sprint, you dash up to your foe and swing.

fighterFeats.name: Aggressive Block
fighterFeats.benefits: You push back as you block the attack, knocking your foe away or off balance.

fighterFeats.name: Assisting Shot
fighterFeats.benefits: With a quick shot, you interfere with a foe in combat.

fighterFeats.name: Brutish Shove
fighterFeats.benefits: Throwing your weight behind your attack, you hit you opponent hard enough to make it stumble back.

fighterFeats.name: Combat Grab
fighterFeats.benefits: You swipe at your opponent and grab at them.

fighterFeats.name: Dragging Strike
fighterFeats.benefits: You aim your weapon to snag a foe's armor, clothing, or flesh to pull them closer.

fighterFeats.name: Dueling Parry (Fighter)
fighterFeats.benefits: You can parry attacks against you with your one-handed weapon.

fighterFeats.name: Intimidating Strike
fighterFeats.benefits: Your blow not only wounds creatures but also shatters their confidence.

fighterFeats.name: Lunge
fighterFeats.benefits: Extending your body to its limits, you attack an enemy that would normally be beyond your reach.

fighterFeats.name: Rebounding Toss

fighterFeats.name: Twin Parry

fighterFeats.name: Advanced Weapon Training

fighterFeats.name: Advantageous Assault

fighterFeats.name: Blind-Fight

fighterFeats.name: Dueling Riposte

fighterFeats.name: Incredible Aim

fighterFeats.name: Mobile Shot Stance

fighterFeats.name: Cut from the Air

fighterFeats.name: Brutal Finish

fighterFeats.name: Flinging Shove

fighterFeats.benefits: Your weapon whirls and darts, striking foes whenever the opportunity presents itself.

fighterFeats.name: Spring Attack

fighterFeats.name: Desperate Finisher
fighterFeats.benefits: You throw everything into one last press.

fighterFeats.name: Whirlwind Strike

fighterFeats.name: Graceful Poise

fighterFeats.name: Improved Reflexive Shield
fighterFeats.benefits: Your shield can help save nearby allies.

fighterFeats.name: Multishot Stance

fighterFeats.name: Overwhelming Blow

fighterFeats.name: Twinned Defense (Fighter)
fighterFeats.benefits: You’re always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you.

fighterFeats.name: Impossible Volley

fighterFeats.name: Savage Critical
fighterFeats.benefits: The wounds you inflict are grievous.

fighterFeats.name: Smash from the Air
fighterFeats.benefits: Your expertise enables you to knock away spells.

fighterFeats.name: Boundless Reprisals
fighterFeats.benefits: With a sixth sense for the flow of combat, you can quickly react to any situation as required.

fighterFeats.benefits: You attempt to counteract the triggering spell using powerful magical techniques observed in the Kortos Mounts.

fighterFeats.benefits: Your experience keeps you on your toes, making you adaptable to even the most dangerous challenges.

fighterFeats.name: Weapon Supremacy

monkFeats.name: Crane Stance

monkFeats.name: Timeless Body

rangerFeats.name: Animal Companion
