rangerFeats.name: Blind-Fight
rangerFeats.benefits: Your battle instincts make you more aware of concealed and invisible opponents.

rangerFeats.name: Deadly Aim
rangerFeats.benefits: You aim for your prey’s weak spots, making your shot more challenging but dealing more damage if you hit.

rangerFeats.name: Enlarge Companion
rangerFeats.benefits: You make your companion enormous.

rangerFeats.name: Hazard Finder
rangerFeats.benefits: You have an intuitive ability to sense hazards.

rangerFeats.name: Powerful Snares
rangerFeats.benefits: Your snares are particularly dif cult for enemies to avoid.

rangerFeats.name: Terrain Master
rangerFeats.benefits: You adapt to your surroundings in any natural terrain.

rangerFeats.name: Warden's Boon
rangerFeats.benefits: By pointing out vulnerabilities, you grant an ally benefits from your hunting abilities.

rangerFeats.name: Camouflage
rangerFeats.benefits: You alter your appearance to blend in to the wilderness.

rangerFeats.name: Hunter's Vision
rangerFeats.benefits: You are so focused on your hunted prey that you can see it clearly even beyond the limits of your senses.

rangerFeats.name: Incredible Companion (Ranger)
rangerFeats.benefits: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop.

rangerFeats.name: Master Monster Hunter
rangerFeats.benefits: You have a nearly encyclopedic knowledge of all creatures of the world.

rangerFeats.name: Penetrating Shot
rangerFeats.benefits: You shoot clear through an intervening creature to hit your prey.

rangerFeats.name: Terrain Transposition
rangerFeats.benefits: You are so connected to the wilderness that you can magically jump from place to place within it.

rangerFeats.name: Twin Riposte
rangerFeats.benefits: A clever parry with one weapon leaves your opponent open to an attack with the other weapon.

rangerFeats.name: Warden's Step
rangerFeats.benefits: You can guide your allies to move quietly through the wilderness.

rangerFeats.name: Distracting Shot
rangerFeats.benefits: The sheer power of your attacks, or the overwhelming number of them, leaves an enemy flustered.

rangerFeats.name: Double Prey
rangerFeats.benefits: You can focus on two foes at once, hunting both of them down.

rangerFeats.name: Lightning Snares
rangerFeats.prerequisites: Quick Snares; Snare Specialist; master in Crafting
rangerFeats.benefits: You can rig a trap with incredible speed.

rangerFeats.name: Second Sting
rangerFeats.benefits: You read your prey’s movements and transform them into openings, so failures with one weapon set up glancing blows with the other.

rangerFeats.name: Side by Side (Ranger)
rangerFeats.benefits: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them of balance.

rangerFeats.name: Warden's Focus
rangerFeats.benefits: Your connection with your surroundings grows deeper as you focus.

rangerFeats.name: Sense the Unseen
rangerFeats.benefits: When you look for foes, you can catch even the slightest cues.

rangerFeats.name: Shared Prey
rangerFeats.benefits: Hunting as a duo, you and your ally both single out your prey.

rangerFeats.name: Stealthy Companion
rangerFeats.benefits: You’ve trained your animal companion to blend in to its surroundings.

rangerFeats.name: Targeting Shot
rangerFeats.benefits: You carefully track your prey’s position and defenses.

rangerFeats.name: Warden's Guidance
rangerFeats.benefits: You can convey your prey’s location to your allies, no matter how well hidden it is.

rangerFeats.name: Greater Distracting Shot
rangerFeats.benefits: Even a single missile can throw of your enemy’s balance, and more powerful attacks leave it flustered for longer.

rangerFeats.name: Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger)
rangerFeats.benefits: You are able to riposte an additional time per turn.

rangerFeats.name: Legendary Monster Hunter
rangerFeats.prerequisites: Master Monster Hunter; legendary in Nature
rangerFeats.benefits: Your knowledge of monsters is so incredible that it reveals glaring flaws in your prey.

rangerFeats.name: Specialized Companion (Ranger)
rangerFeats.benefits: Your animal companion has become cunning enough to become specialized.

rangerFeats.name: Ubiquitous Snares
rangerFeats.benefits: You can prepare a seemingly impossible number of snares in advance, and you’re ready to spring them on unsuspecting foes.

rangerFeats.name: Impossible Flurry
rangerFeats.benefits: You forgo precision to attack at an impossible speed.

rangerFeats.name: Impossible Volley
rangerFeats.benefits: You fire a volley at all foes in an area.

rangerFeats.name: Manifold Edge
rangerFeats.benefits: You’ve learned every possible edge to use against your foes.

rangerFeats.name: Masterful Companion
rangerFeats.benefits: Your animal companion shares your incredible hunting skills, allowing it to take down your shared prey with ease.

rangerFeats.name: Perfect Shot
rangerFeats.benefits: After watching the motions of combat with incredible intensity and precision, you fire at your prey at the perfect moment to deliver maximum pain.

rangerFeats.name: Shadow Hunter
rangerFeats.benefits: You blend in to your surroundings so well that others have trouble telling you apart from the terrain.

rangerFeats.name: Warden's Wellspring
rangerFeats.benefits: You command unparalleled focus when you commune with the world around you.

rangerFeats.name: Accurate Flurry
rangerFeats.benefits: You refine the precision of your unbelievable storm of blows.

rangerFeats.name: Impossible Snares
rangerFeats.benefits: You can create endless shorter-lived snares, protecting your lair or using them against foes.

rangerFeats.name: Legendary Shot
rangerFeats.prerequisites: masterful hunter; legendary in Perception; Far Shot
rangerFeats.benefits: You focus on your hunted prey, perceiving angles, air resistance, and every variable that would af ect your ranged attack.

rangerFeats.name: Mimic Protections
rangerFeats.benefits: By adopting resonant reflections, you have learned to copy the abilities of other creatures as well.

rangerFeats.name: Superior Sight
rangerFeats.benefits: Increase your visual acuity.

rangerFeats.name: To the Ends of the Earth
rangerFeats.benefits: Your ability to track your prey has surpassed explanation, allowing you to trace your prey’s movements and predict its location with ease.

rangerFeats.name: Triple Threat
rangerFeats.benefits: You can divide your attention three ways when hunting.

rangerFeats.name: Ultimate Skirmisher
rangerFeats.benefits: You are so skilled at navigating the wild, your movement is completely unaffected by terrain.

rogueFeats.name: Nimble Dodge
rogueFeats.benefits: You deftly dodge out of the way.

rogueFeats.name: Overextending Feint
rogueFeats.benefits: When you trick a foe, instead of catching them off guard, you goad them into overextending their next attack.

rogueFeats.name: Plant Evidence
rogueFeats.benefits: You can put a single item you're holding of light or negligible Bulk onto a person without them noticing.

rogueFeats.name: Trap Finder
rogueFeats.benefits: You have an intuitive sense that alerts you to the dangers and presence of traps.

rogueFeats.name: Tumble Behind (Rogue)
rogueFeats.benefits: You tumble under and behind your foe to catch them off guard.

rogueFeats.name: Twin Feint
rogueFeats.benefits: You make a dazzling series of attacks with both weapons, using the first attack to throw your foe of guard against a second attack at a different angle.

rogueFeats.name: You're Next
rogueFeats.benefits: After downing a foe, you menacingly remind another foe that you’re coming after them next.

rogueFeats.name: Brutal Beating
rogueFeats.benefits: The brutality of your critical hits shakes your foes’ confidence.

rogueFeats.name: Clever Gambit
rogueFeats.benefits: Your battle tactics are aided by your assessment of your foes' capabilities, allowing you to instantly adjust your movements to maximum advantage.

rogueFeats.name: Distracting Feint
rogueFeats.benefits: Your Feints are far more distracting than normal, drawing your foes’ attention and allowing you and your allies to take greater advantage.

rogueFeats.name: Fane's Fourberie
rogueFeats.benefits: Stella Fane has perfected a technique for using playing cards as weapons that's one part sleight of hand and one part magic

rogueFeats.name: Minor Magic
rogueFeats.benefits: You’ve dabbled in a variety of tricks, gaining minor magical abilities from a particular tradition.

rogueFeats.name: Mobility
rogueFeats.benefits: You move in a way that denies your enemies the opportunity to retaliate.

rogueFeats.name: Quick Draw
rogueFeats.benefits: You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion.

rogueFeats.name: Strong Arm
rogueFeats.benefits: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, the weapon's range increment increases 10 feet.

rogueFeats.name: Unbalancing Blow
rogueFeats.benefits: Interweaving your most powerful attacks in a graceful flow, you temporarily unbalance your foes. Whenever your Strike is a critical hit and deals damage, the target is flat-footed against your attacks until the end of your next turn.

rogueFeats.name: Underhanded Assault
rogueFeats.benefits: You capitalize on the distraction provided by an ally.

rogueFeats.name: Battle Assessment
rogueFeats.benefits: With careful observation during battle, you identify an enemy’s strengths and weaknesses.

rogueFeats.name: Dread Striker
rogueFeats.benefits: You capitalize on your enemies’ fear to slip past their defenses.

rogueFeats.name: Head Stomp
rogueFeats.benefits: Make an unarmed melee attack against a prone target.

rogueFeats.name: Magical Trickster
rogueFeats.benefits: You can sneak spells past your foes’ defenses as easily as any blade.

rogueFeats.name: Mug
rogueFeats.benefits: You make a quick attack and rob your foe in the process.

rogueFeats.name: Poison Weapon
rogueFeats.benefits: You apply poison to a weapon.

rogueFeats.name: Predictable!
rogueFeats.benefits: By observing an opponent, you can get a sense of their next move and prepare to counter or resist it.

rogueFeats.name: Reactive Pursuit
rogueFeats.benefits: You keep pace with a retreating foe.

rogueFeats.name: Sabotage
rogueFeats.benefits: You subtly damage others’ equipment.

rogueFeats.name: Scout's Warning
rogueFeats.benefits: You visually or audibly warn your allies of danger.

rogueFeats.name: The Harder They Fall
rogueFeats.benefits: You make your foes fall painfully when you trip them.

rogueFeats.name: Twin Distraction
rogueFeats.benefits: Your movements with two weapons are so swift and disorienting that they befuddle your opponent.

rogueFeats.name: Analyze Weakness
rogueFeats.benefits: Your knowledge of a creature's physiology and understanding of tactics helps you attack with pinpoint accuracy.

rogueFeats.name: Anticipate Ambush
rogueFeats.benefits: Using your extensive knowledge of ambush tactics, you keep watch for any hidden creatures or dangerous sites, moving at half your travel speed.

rogueFeats.name: Far Throw
rogueFeats.benefits: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, you take only a –1 penalty for each additional range increment between you and the target, rather than a –2 penalty.

rogueFeats.name: Gang Up
rogueFeats.benefits: You and your allies harry an opponent in concert.

rogueFeats.name: Light Step
rogueFeats.benefits: You aren’t bothered by tricky footing.

rogueFeats.name: Shove Down
rogueFeats.benefits: You leverage your weight to topple foes that you move.

rogueFeats.name: Skirmish Strike
rogueFeats.benefits: Your feet and weapon move in tandem.

rogueFeats.name: Slice and Swipe
rogueFeats.benefits: Steal from your target when you successfully strike them.

rogueFeats.name: Stella's Stab and Snag
rogueFeats.benefits: You dart towards your opponent, seeking to stab them and slice their purse-strings with a single movement

rogueFeats.name: Twist the Knife
rogueFeats.benefits: After stabbing your opponent in a weak spot, you tear the wound open.

rogueFeats.name: Watch Your Back
rogueFeats.benefits: You menace the target, stoking their fears and drawing their attention.

rogueFeats.name: Ambushing Knockdown
rogueFeats.benefits: You emerge from hiding and deliver a blow that can knock an enemy sprawling to the ground.

rogueFeats.name: Blind-Fight
rogueFeats.benefits: Your battle instincts make you more aware of concealed and invisible opponents.

rogueFeats.name: Bullseye
rogueFeats.benefits: You carefully take aim before making your attack in order to avoid your foe's concealment and cover.

rogueFeats.name: Delay Trap
rogueFeats.benefits: You can jam the workings of a trap to delay its effects.

rogueFeats.name: Improved Poison Weapon
rogueFeats.benefits: You deliver poisons in ways that maximize their harmful effects.

rogueFeats.name: Inspired Stratagem
rogueFeats.benefits: You quickly advise your ally, using your earlier planning to make sure luck can't throw a wrench in the cogs of your schemes.

rogueFeats.name: Loaner Spell
rogueFeats.prerequisites: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
rogueFeats.benefits: During your daily preparations, you can gain the assistance of an allied prepared spellcaster to prepare one spell for the day.

rogueFeats.name: Nimble Roll
rogueFeats.benefits: You throw yourself into a roll to escape imminent danger.

rogueFeats.name: Opportune Backstab
rogueFeats.benefits: When your enemy is hit by your ally, you capitalize upon the distraction.

rogueFeats.name: Predictive Purchase (Rogue)
rogueFeats.benefits: You somehow manage to have just the thing for the situation.

rogueFeats.name: Ricochet Stance (Rogue)
rogueFeats.benefits: You adopt a stance (page 150) to rebound your thrown weapons toward you.

rogueFeats.name: Sidestep
rogueFeats.benefits: You deftly step out of the way of an attack, letting the blow continue to the creature next to you.

rogueFeats.name: Sly Striker
rogueFeats.benefits: Your attacks deal more damage, even against creatures that aren’t flat-footed.

rogueFeats.name: Subtle Shank
rogueFeats.benefits: You draw a concealed weapon, attack with it, and then hide it away again in one smooth motion.

rogueFeats.name: Tactical Entry
rogueFeats.benefits: Stride without triggering reactions

rogueFeats.name: Deny Support
rogueFeats.benefits: Keep opponents from flanking when you Feint them.

rogueFeats.name: Eldritch Debilitations
rogueFeats.benefits: You know how to apply debilitations that are particularly troublesome for spellcasters.

rogueFeats.name: Methodical Debilitations
rogueFeats.benefits: You strategically craft your debilitations to lessen or negate an enemy's tactical advantages.

rogueFeats.name: Precise Debilitation
rogueFeats.benefits: You carefully aim and gracefully deliver your debilitations.

rogueFeats.name: Sneak Savant
rogueFeats.benefits: It is almost impossible to spot you without taking effort to look.

rogueFeats.name: Tactical Debilitations
rogueFeats.benefits: You learn new debilitations that grant you tactical advantages against your foes.

rogueFeats.name: Vicious Debilitations
rogueFeats.benefits: The debilitations you dish out seriously impair your foes.

rogueFeats.name: Bloody Debilitations
rogueFeats.benefits: Your attacks slice arteries and veins.

rogueFeats.name: Coordinated Distraction
rogueFeats.benefits: You distract an opponent from the fact that one of your allies is about to attack them.

rogueFeats.name: Critical Debilitations
rogueFeats.benefits: Your debilitations are especially effective on your most powerful attacks.

rogueFeats.name: Deadly Poison Weapon
rogueFeats.benefits: Your poisons are devastatingly potent.

rogueFeats.name: Fantastic Leap
rogueFeats.benefits: You launch yourself through the air at a foe.

rogueFeats.name: Felling Shot
rogueFeats.benefits: Your ranged attacks can shoot an unprepared foe right out of the air.

rogueFeats.name: Preparation
rogueFeats.benefits: You survey the battlefield, calculating the possibilities.

rogueFeats.name: Reactive Interference
rogueFeats.benefits: You reflexively foil an enemy’s response.

rogueFeats.name: Ricochet Feint
rogueFeats.benefits: While in Ricochet Stance, you can bounce a thrown weapon off a foe to distract them.

rogueFeats.name: Spring from the Shadows
rogueFeats.benefits: Leaping out from hiding, you assail your target when they least expect it.

rogueFeats.name: Defensive Roll
rogueFeats.benefits: Dropping into a roll to disperse the force of the blow, you can partially evade a lethal attack and stay conscious.

rogueFeats.name: Instant Opening
rogueFeats.benefits: You distract your opponent with a few choice words or a rude gesture.

rogueFeats.name: Leave an Opening
rogueFeats.benefits: When you hit hard enough, you leave an opening so your ally can jump in on the action.

rogueFeats.name: Sense the Unseen
rogueFeats.benefits: When you look for foes, you can catch even the slightest cues.

rogueFeats.name: Stay Down!
rogueFeats.benefits: You have ways of keeping your foes down.

rogueFeats.name: Blank Slate
rogueFeats.benefits: Your deceptions confound even the most powerful mortal divinations.

rogueFeats.name: Cloud Step
rogueFeats.benefits: Using fantastic acrobatic skill, you can walk for brief stretches across insubstantial surfaces.

rogueFeats.name: Cognitive Loophole
rogueFeats.benefits: You can find a loophole in a mental effect to temporarily overcome it.

rogueFeats.name: Dispelling Slice
rogueFeats.benefits: Your sneak attack slices through the threads binding magic to a target.

rogueFeats.name: Perfect Distraction
rogueFeats.benefits: You use clever tactics to mislead your foes as you sneak away. You Sneak while leaving a decoy behind.

rogueFeats.name: Reconstruct the Scene
rogueFeats.benefits: You spend 1 minute surveying a small location (such as a single room) to get an impression of events that occurred there in the last day.

rogueFeats.name: Steal Spell
rogueFeats.benefits: When you use Legendary Thief to steal the impossible, you can steal a prepared spell or spontaneous spell from a foe.

rogueFeats.name: Swift Elusion
rogueFeats.benefits: Attempt an Acrobatics check against the foe's Reflex DC.

rogueFeats.name: Implausible Infiltration
rogueFeats.benefits: You find tiny holes or imperfections that no one else could see and try to somehow fit yourself through them.

rogueFeats.name: Implausible Purchase (Rogue)
rogueFeats.benefits: Even when impossible, you always have exactly what you need.

rogueFeats.name: Powerful Sneak
rogueFeats.benefits: You have learned to exploit your enemies’ lowered defenses.

rogueFeats.name: Trickster's Ace
rogueFeats.benefits: You have a contingency in your back pocket for desperate situations.

rogueFeats.name: Enduring Debilitation
rogueFeats.benefits: Your debilitations last for 1 minute.

rogueFeats.name: Hidden Paragon
rogueFeats.benefits: When you put your mind to slipping out of sight, you disappear completely.

rogueFeats.name: Impossible Striker
rogueFeats.benefits: Your attacks are swift and deadly beyond explanation.

rogueFeats.name: Reactive Distraction
rogueFeats.benefits: You reactively switch with your decoy to foil your foe.

rogueFeats.name: Steal Essence
rogueFeats.prerequisites: legendary in Thievery, master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
rogueFeats.benefits: Being in the presence of the aeon orbs as they deteriorated has taught you how to siphon energy, and you do so with the required magic item.

sorcererFeats.name: Ancestral Blood Magic
sorcererFeats.benefits: The magic of your bloodline mixes with that of your ancestry.

sorcererFeats.name: Blessed Blood
sorcererFeats.prerequisites: bloodline that grants divine spells; you follow a deity
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your deity’s blessings manifest in your blood-borne power

sorcererFeats.name: Counterspell
sorcererFeats.benefits: When a foe Casts a Spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your own magic to disrupt it.

sorcererFeats.name: Dangerous Sorcery
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your legacy grants you great destructive power.

sorcererFeats.name: Familiar
sorcererFeats.benefits: An animal serves you and assists your spellcasting.

sorcererFeats.name: Reach Spell
sorcererFeats.benefits: You can extend your spells’ range.

sorcererFeats.name: Widen Spell
sorcererFeats.benefits: You manipulate the energy of your spell, causing it to spread out and affect a wider area.

sorcererFeats.name: Anoint Ally
sorcererFeats.benefits: You forge a mystical connection with an ally using your body as a focus, allowing them to benefit from your magic.

sorcererFeats.name: Cantrip Expansion
sorcererFeats.benefits: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

sorcererFeats.name: Enhanced Familiar
sorcererFeats.benefits: You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities.

sorcererFeats.name: Entreat with Forebears
sorcererFeats.prerequisites: a bloodline that corresponds with a creature trait
sorcererFeats.benefits: Something about your presence causes creatures of your bloodline to, consciously or not, recognize you as one of their own, and you become inured to their tricks.

sorcererFeats.name: Arcane Evolution
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your arcane legacy grants you an exceptional aptitude for intellectual and academic pursuits.

sorcererFeats.name: Bespell Weapon
sorcererFeats.benefits: You siphon the residual energy from the last spell you cast into one weapon you’re wielding.

sorcererFeats.name: Divine Evolution
sorcererFeats.benefits: The divine might provided by your bloodline flows through you.

sorcererFeats.name: Elaborate Flourish
sorcererFeats.benefits: You embellish your spellcasting with entrancing flourishes and grand pronouncements, making it harder to identify or counter.

sorcererFeats.name: Occult Evolution
sorcererFeats.benefits: Glimpses of the obscure secrets of the universe loan you power.

sorcererFeats.name: Primal Evolution
sorcererFeats.benefits: You can call upon the creatures of the wild for aid.

sorcererFeats.name: Split Shot
sorcererFeats.benefits: You fragment a ranged spell into a pair of smaller shots.

sorcererFeats.name: Advanced Bloodline
sorcererFeats.benefits: You have studied your bloodline to learn the secrets of its magic.

sorcererFeats.name: Diverting Vortex
sorcererFeats.benefits: You transfer vestiges of magical energy to the air around you, creating a vortex that deflects ranged attacks.

sorcererFeats.name: Energetic Resonance
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your blood resonates with magical energy, mitigating the effects of harmful spells.

sorcererFeats.name: Spell Relay
sorcererFeats.benefits: You open the power in your blood to your ally's spellcasting, using your magic to boost their range.

sorcererFeats.name: Steady Spellcasting
sorcererFeats.benefits: You don’t lose spells easily.

sorcererFeats.name: Bloodline Resistance
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your magical blood makes you more resistant to magic.

sorcererFeats.name: Crossblooded Evolution
sorcererFeats.benefits: Odd interactions in your bloodline provide you with unexpected spells.

sorcererFeats.name: Safeguarded Spell
sorcererFeats.benefits: You bring the magical wavelengths of your spell into sync with the ones produced by your own body.

sorcererFeats.name: Soulsight
sorcererFeats.prerequisites: [Sorcerer] bloodline that grants divine or occult spells
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your muse has opened your senses to the world beyond.

sorcererFeats.name: Ancestral Mage
sorcererFeats.benefits: The magic of your ancestry and bloodline are one and the same.

sorcererFeats.name: Energy Fusion
sorcererFeats.benefits: You fuse two spells together, combining their energy types.

sorcererFeats.name: Energy Ward
sorcererFeats.benefits: You trap energy from the last spell you cast within your body, coating your flesh in a protective ward.

sorcererFeats.name: Greater Bloodline
sorcererFeats.benefits: Further communion with the legacy of your bloodline has uncovered greater secrets.

sorcererFeats.name: Overwhelming Energy
sorcererFeats.benefits: You alter your spells to overcome resistances.

sorcererFeats.name: Quickened Casting
sorcererFeats.benefits: You are able to quickly cast a spell.

sorcererFeats.name: Signature Spell Expansion
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your innate connection to magic lets you cast more spells with greater freedom.

sorcererFeats.name: Blood Component Substitution
sorcererFeats.benefits: You can bypass the need for incantations and gestures by drawing energy directly from your blood, causing you to visibly glow the color of your blood and crackle with magical energy.

sorcererFeats.name: Bloodline Focus
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your bloodline cause you to recover focus faster.

sorcererFeats.name: Greater Physical Evolution
sorcererFeats.benefits: You hold a deep understanding of the innate fundamental structures of the physical world, and you can enforce your will upon that structure as far as your own blood is concerned.

sorcererFeats.name: Greater Spiritual Evolution
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your magical blood is rich with spiritual essence, and this infusion within you allows your spells to be fully effective against incorporeal creatures, spirits, and creatures on the Ethereal Plane.

sorcererFeats.name: Magic Sense
sorcererFeats.benefits: You have a literal sixth sense for magic.

sorcererFeats.name: Consume Spell
sorcererFeats.benefits: When you successfully Counterspell a spell of the tradition that matches your bloodline, you consume it, replenishing yourself with its energy.

sorcererFeats.name: Interweave Dispel
sorcererFeats.prerequisites: dispel magic in your spell repertoire
sorcererFeats.benefits: You weave dispelling energy into a spell, sending both effects at a foe.

sorcererFeats.name: Reflect Spell
sorcererFeats.benefits: You cause a spell to fire back at its caster.

sorcererFeats.name: Spell Shroud
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your spell shrouds you in a billowing cloud.

sorcererFeats.name: Effortless Concentration
sorcererFeats.benefits: You can maintain a spell with hardly a thought.

sorcererFeats.name: Greater Mental Evolution
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your bloodline’s deep connection to mental essence greatly enhances your spell repertoire.

sorcererFeats.name: Greater Vital Evolution
sorcererFeats.benefits: Vital power surges through you like a font of energy.

sorcererFeats.name: Scintillating Spell
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your spells become a radiant display of light and color.

sorcererFeats.name: Terraforming Spell
sorcererFeats.benefits: You capture transformative fragments of magic and slam them into the ground, creating a shock wave that alters your surroundings.

sorcererFeats.name: Bloodline Wellspring
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your blood’s power replenishes your focus.

sorcererFeats.name: Echoing Spell
sorcererFeats.benefits: You time the components of your spell with exacting precision, setting up a resonance that duplicates the spell's effects.

sorcererFeats.name: Greater Crossblooded Evolution
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your bloodline is extraordinarily complex.

sorcererFeats.name: Bloodline Conduit
sorcererFeats.benefits: Your inborn magical nature lets you redirect ambient energies to fuel your spells.

sorcererFeats.name: Bloodline Metamorphosis
sorcererFeats.benefits: Swap out spells from your repertoire more easily.

sorcererFeats.name: Bloodline Mutation
sorcererFeats.prerequisites: a bloodline based on a specific type of creature
sorcererFeats.benefits: You permanently mutate to become more like the creatures of your bloodline.

sorcererFeats.name: Bloodline Perfection
sorcererFeats.benefits: You command the ultimate powers of your bloodline and tradition.

sorcererFeats.name: Metamagic Mastery
sorcererFeats.benefits: Altering your spells doesn’t take any longer than casting them normally.

sorcererFeats.name: Tenacious Blood Magic
sorcererFeats.benefits: You have learned how to invest magic more deeply by witnessing Aroden's works.

wizardFeats.name: Counterspell
wizardFeats.benefits: When a foe Casts a Spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your own magic to disrupt it.

wizardFeats.name: Eschew Materials
wizardFeats.benefits: You can use clever workarounds to replicate the arcane essence of certain materials.

wizardFeats.name: Familiar
wizardFeats.benefits: An animal serves you and assists your spellcasting.

wizardFeats.name: Hand of the Apprentice
wizardFeats.benefits: You can magically hurl your weapon at your foe.

wizardFeats.name: Reach Spell
wizardFeats.benefits: You can extend your spells’ range.

wizardFeats.name: Spellbook Prodigy
wizardFeats.benefits: You are particularly adept at learning spells to add to your spellbook.

wizardFeats.name: Widen Spell
wizardFeats.benefits: You manipulate the energy of your spell, causing it to spread out and affect a wider area.

wizardFeats.name: Cantrip Expansion
wizardFeats.benefits: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

wizardFeats.name: Conceal Spell
wizardFeats.benefits: Hiding your gestures and incantations within other speech and movement, you attempt to conceal the fact that you are casting a spell.

wizardFeats.name: Energy Ablation
wizardFeats.benefits: When you cast energy spells, you retain some of that energy as a protective barrier.

wizardFeats.name: Enhanced Familiar
wizardFeats.benefits: You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities.

wizardFeats.name: Nonlethal Spell
wizardFeats.benefits: You can alter offensive spells to be less deadly.

wizardFeats.name: Bespell Weapon
wizardFeats.benefits: You siphon the residual energy from the last spell you cast into one weapon you’re wielding.

wizardFeats.name: Call Bonded Item
wizardFeats.benefits: You're mystically connected to your bonded item and can call it to your hand.

wizardFeats.name: Linked Focus
wizardFeats.benefits: You have linked your bonded item to the well of energy that powers your school spells.

wizardFeats.name: Silent Spell
wizardFeats.benefits: You’ve learned how to cast many of your spells without speaking the words of power you would normally need to provide.

wizardFeats.name: Convincing Illusion
wizardFeats.benefits: You use your deceptive skills to make your illusions seem even more real.

wizardFeats.name: Spell Penetration
wizardFeats.benefits: You’ve studied ways of overcoming the innate magical resistance that certain powerful creatures have.

wizardFeats.name: Split Slot
wizardFeats.benefits: You can prepare two spells in one slot, giving you the freedom to choose the spell when you cast it.

wizardFeats.name: Steady Spellcasting
wizardFeats.benefits: You don’t lose spells easily.

wizardFeats.name: Advanced School Spell
wizardFeats.benefits: You gain access to a powerful new school spell depending on your arcane school.

wizardFeats.name: Bond Conservation
wizardFeats.benefits: By carefully manipulating the arcane energies stored in your bonded item as you drain it, you can conserve just enough power to cast another, slightly weaker spell.

wizardFeats.name: Form Retention
wizardFeats.benefits: You have trained your mind and body to tolerate polymorph magic for longer periods of time, so long as you prepare for the change appropriately.

wizardFeats.name: Universal Versatility
wizardFeats.prerequisites: universalist wizard; Hand of the Apprentice
wizardFeats.benefits: You can access the fundamental abilities of any school of magic.

wizardFeats.name: Overwhelming Energy
wizardFeats.benefits: You alter your spells to overcome resistances.

wizardFeats.name: Quickened Casting
wizardFeats.benefits: You are able to quickly cast a spell.

wizardFeats.name: Scroll Savant
wizardFeats.benefits: During your daily preparations, you can create two temporary scrolls containing arcane spells from your spellbook.

wizardFeats.name: Clever Counterspell
wizardFeats.benefits: You creatively apply your prepared spells to counterspell a much wider variety of your opponents’ magic.

wizardFeats.name: Diviner Sense
wizardFeats.benefits: You sense magical dangers.

wizardFeats.name: Forcible Energy
wizardFeats.benefits: You perform complex manipulations to make the energy from your spells so powerful that your enemies remain vulnerable to it afterward.

wizardFeats.name: Magic Sense
wizardFeats.benefits: You have a literal sixth sense for magic.

wizardFeats.name: Bonded Focus
wizardFeats.benefits: Your connection to your bonded item increases your focus pool.

wizardFeats.name: Reflect Spell
wizardFeats.benefits: You cause a spell to fire back at its caster.

wizardFeats.name: Superior Bond
wizardFeats.benefits: When you draw upon your bonded item, you can leave a bit of energy within it for later use.

wizardFeats.name: Effortless Concentration
wizardFeats.benefits: You can maintain a spell with hardly a thought.

wizardFeats.name: Spell Tinker
wizardFeats.benefits: You’ve learned to alter choices you make when casting spells on yourself.

wizardFeats.name: Infinite Possibilities
wizardFeats.benefits: You’ve found a way to prepare a spell slot that exists in your mind as many different possibilities at once.

wizardFeats.name: Reprepare Spell
wizardFeats.benefits: You’ve discovered how to reuse some of your spell slots over and over.

wizardFeats.name: Second Chance Spell
wizardFeats.benefits: When your target proves resilient to your magical deceptions, you can try them again on someone else.

wizardFeats.name: Archwizard's Might
wizardFeats.benefits: You have mastered the greatest secrets of arcane magic.

wizardFeats.name: Metamagic Mastery
wizardFeats.benefits: Altering your spells doesn’t take any longer than casting them normally.

wizardFeats.name: Reclaim Spell
wizardFeats.benefits: You have learned to manipulate reflections of magic, similar to the resonant reflections.

wizardFeats.name: Spell Combination
wizardFeats.benefits: You can merge spells, producing multiple effects with a single casting.

wizardFeats.name: Spell Mastery
wizardFeats.benefits: You have mastered a handful of spells to such a degree that you can cast them even if you haven't prepared them in advance.
